authPage.title: platform for online learning of foreign languages
authPage.taglineOne: Study online at a convenient time of the day from anywhere
authPage.taglineTwo: Choose experienced teachers from all over the world
authPage.reqPassword: Password required. Use numbers and latin letters
authPage.passMax: Password cannot have more than 20 characters
authPage.haveAcc: Do you already have an account?
authPage.formDate: Date of birth in DD.MM.YYYY format
authPage.greatThan: You must be at least 18 years of age
authPage.reqLettLow: Password must contain at least 1 latin lowercase letter
authPage.reqLettUpp: Password must contain at least 1 latin capital letter
authPage.wrongFormatPassword: Only numbers and letters of the Latin alphabet
authPage.reqNumb: Password must contain at least 1 number
authPage.errSignIn: An error has occurred. Check your details.

mainPage.title: platform for online learning of foreign languages
mainPage.titleWords: With the help of our platform, you will find experienced teachers from all over the world and will be able to study online at a convenient time of the day from anywhere.
mainPage.whyTitle: Why is it worth learning a language with us?
mainPage.aboutExperTeacher: On the platform you will find professional teachers and native speakers
mainPage.aboutConvenSchedule: Choose your own convenient time for learning a language
mainPage.aboutAffordPrices: Choose your own convenient time for learning a language
mainPage.aboutFreeLesson: Take a free trial language lesson with a teacher

registrationPage.errorFileSizeImage: The file size is too large, no more than 2 MB.

registrationPage.errLevel: Please indicate your level of proficiency
